remarks: Meet value.  Since both sides evaluate to ` (/) ` when they don't exist, for convenience we drop the ` { X , Y } e. dom G ` requirement. (Contributed by NM, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetdef.u $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
meetdef.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetdef.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetdef.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. W ) $.
meetdef.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. Z ) $.
meetval $p |- ( ph -> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( G ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
